datapack.description: Heavy language features for MCFunction files
datapack.commands.regenerateCache.title: Regenerate Cache
datapack.config.env.dataVersion: The version of the completion data, including registries, block definitions, and nbtdoc. Should be an identity in the [version manifest](https://launchermeta.mojang.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json) which was released after `19w40a`. Apart from a version identity, you can also input `Latest release` or `Latest snapshot` here (case-insensitive).
datapack.config.env.dependsOnVanilla: Whether this datapack depends on the vanilla datapack or not. If this option is enabled, completions for the corresponding data of the vanilla datapack will be provided.
datapack.config.env.cmdVersion: The version of the command tree. Only major versions are available.
datapack.config.features.colors: Whether DHP should provide color supports or not.
datapack.config.features.completions: Whether DHP should provide completions or not.
datapack.config.features.documentHighlig: Whether DHP should provide document highlighting or not.
datapack.config.features.documentLinks: Whether DHP should provide document links or not.
datapack.config.features.foldingRanges: Whether DHP should provide folding ranges or not.
datapack.config.features.formatting: Whether DHP should provide formatting feature or not.
datapack.config.features.semanticColorin: Whether DHP should provide semantic coloring or not.
datapack.config.features.selectionRanges: Whether DHP should provide selection ranges or not.
datapack.config.features.signatures: Whether DHP should provide signature information for commands or not.
datapack.config.lint.blockStateSortKeys: Whether to sort the keys in block states or not.
datapack.config.lint.nbtByteSuffix: The suffix used for TAG_Byte in NBTs.
datapack.config.lint.nbtUseBooleans: Whether `0b` and `1b` should be represents by `false` and `true` in NBTs or not.
datapack.config.lint.nbtShortSuffix: The suffix used for TAG_Short in NBTs.
datapack.config.lint.nbtLongSuffix: The suffix used for TAG_Long in NBTs.
datapack.config.lint.nbtFloatSuffix: The suffix used for TAG_Float in NBTs.
datapack.config.lint.nbtDoubleSuffix: The suffix used for TAG_Double in NBTs.
datapack.config.lint.nbtOmitDoubleSuffix: Whether to omit the suffix of double numbers when possible in NBTs or not.
datapack.config.lint.nbtKeepDecimalPlace: Whether to keep at least one decimal place in NBTs or not.
datapack.config.lint.nbtSortKeys: Whether to sort the keys in NBTs or not.
datapack.config.lint.timeOmitTickUnit: Whether to omit the unit of tick (`t`) in time arguments.
datapack.config.lint.nameOfObjectives: The naming convention for scoreboard objectives.
datapack.config.lint.nameOfNbtCompoundTa: The naming convention for compound tag keys in NBTs.
datapack.config.lint.nameOfTags: The naming convention for scoreboard tags.
datapack.config.lint.strictBossbarCheck: Whether to throw warnings for undefined bossbars.
datapack.config.lint.strictStorageCheck: Whether to throw warnings for undefined data storages.
datapack.config.lint.strictObjectiveChec: Whether to throw warnings for undefined objectives.
datapack.config.lint.strictTagCheck: Whether to throw warnings for undefined tags.
datapack.config.lint.strictTeamCheck: Whether to throw warnings for undefined teams.
datapack.config.lint.strictAdvancementCh: Whether to throw warnings for advancements which don't exist in your workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictFunctionCheck: Whether to throw warnings for functions which don't exist in your workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictLootTableChec: Whether to throw warnings for loot tables which don't exist in your workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictPredicateChec: Whether to throw warnings for predicates which don't exist in your workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictRecipeCheck: Whether to throw warnings for recipes which don't exist in your workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictBlockTagCheck: Whether to throw warnings for block tags which don't exist in your workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictEntityTypeTag: Whether to throw warnings for entity type tags which don't exist in your workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictFluidTagCheck: Whether to throw warnings for fluid tags which don't exist in your workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictFunctionTagCh: Whether to throw warnings for function tags which don't exist in your workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictItemTagCheck: Whether to throw warnings for item tags which don't exist in your workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictMobEffectChec: Whether to throw warnings for unknown mob effects.
datapack.config.lint.strictEnchantmentCh: Whether to throw warnings for unknown enchantments.
datapack.config.lint.strictSoundEventChe: Whether to throw warnings for unknown sound events.
datapack.config.lint.strictEntityTypeChe: Whether to throw warnings for unknown entity types.
datapack.config.lint.strictDimensionType: Whether to throw warnings for unknown dimension types.
datapack.config.lint.strictBlockCheck: Whether to throw warnings for unknown blocks.
datapack.config.lint.strictItemCheck: Whether to throw warnings for unknown items.
datapack.config.lint.strictPotionCheck: Whether to throw warnings for unknown potions.
datapack.config.lint.strictMotiveCheck: Whether to throw warnings for unknown motives.
datapack.config.lint.strictFluidCheck: Whether to throw warnings for unknown fluids.
datapack.config.lint.strictParticleTypeC: Whether to throw warnings for unknown particle types.
